snippet: A Delta flight was diverted on Monday after passengers began arguing about a reclining seat–the third flight in less than two weeks that made an unscheduled landing after disputes over reclining between travelers.
abstract: A Delta flight was diverted on Monday after passengers began arguing about a reclining seat–the third flight in less than two weeks that made an unscheduled landing after disputes over reclining between travelers.

headline.main: Another Argument (and Diversion) Over a Reclining Seat
